Interface LinearAlgebraProvider<E>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of scalar elements * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
All Superinterfaces:
ComputeBackend
All Known Implementing Classes:
CPUDenseLinearAlgebraProvider, CPUSparseLinearAlgebraProvider, CUDADenseLinearAlgebraProvider, CUDASparseLinearAlgebraProvider, GRPCLinearAlgebraProvider, OpenCLDenseLinearAlgebraProvider, OpenCLSparseLinearAlgebraProvider
public interface LinearAlgebraProvider<E> extends ComputeBackend
Service provider interface for linear algebra operations.

Implementations of this interface provide the actual computation logic for vectors and matrices, allowing for different backends (Java CPU, Native BLAS, GPU CUDA).

Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
